title: Llama Stack Released To Help Developers Build 'Agentic Apps'
author: Richard MacManus
description: Meta has released the Llama Stack to make it easier for developers to build with Llama LLMs. It's an attempt to standardize AI engineering.
cntitle: Llama Stack 发布，助力开发者构建“代理应用”
cndescription: Meta 发布了 Llama Stack，旨在让开发者更轻松地使用 Llama 大型语言模型进行构建。这是为了实现 AI 工程标准化的一次尝试。
